amendment.description: To modify the definition of underground injection.

vote.text: Amendment SA 48, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 63. Record Vote Number: 41.

action.text: Amendment SA 48 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S531-532; text: CR S531-532) To modify the definition of underground injection.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 48, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 63. Record Vote Number: 41.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 48, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 63. Record Vote Number: 41.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 48 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2.
